ygData.subject: Thex Hammer Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not looking for a spoiler, really, at least not too much of one.  Well, I suppose it depends on personal morals an-    Get on with
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not looking for a spoiler, really, at least not too much of one. Well, I suppose it depends on personal morals an-
<voice in backround> "Get on with it!"
Anyways, Where is Hubard L'rodd, who I'm supposed to give this note to? I think he is in Befallen. BTW, this is NOT the skeleton Lrodd, I have tried giving him the note many times under many different circumstances, but the trade window doesn't pop up. Kizdean Gix told me to contact him for more information.
Other question: What monster holds the Mallet Mold?

Thanks in advance,
Arathil, Dark Elf Necromancer of Povar
